OrgName.entry: BRIAN AIKEN WORLD OF MARTIAL ARTS AND FITNESS STUDIO

Desc.entry: Teaches ju-jitsu for adults and children, grappling (a mix of ju-jitsu/judo and Brazilian ju-jitsu techniques) for adults and self defence for women. Private tuition also available.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon & Fri 6-7pm (children's ju-jitsu); Mon & Thurs 7-8.30pm (adults grappling), 8.30-10pm (adult's ju-jitsu); Sun 1-2pm (children's ju-jitsu), 2-3.30pm (adults ju-jitsu), 3.30-4.30pm (womens self defence)

category.entry: MARTIAL ARTS - AIKIDO, IAIDO, JUDO AND JU-JITSU
